definition: to play matchmaker/to act as a middleman

to pick up (a powder etc) with the fingertips/to scoop up/to collect together/to extract/to gather up/classifier: pinch/Taiwan pr. [cuo4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

sentences.english: Buy flowers, she is at it again, she happily between two people.
sentences.chinese: 買花失利，周母再出新招，她樂此不疲地撮合兩人。

sentences.english: Regard house property information as the website, search room net now more trade like go-between .
sentences.chinese: 作爲房產資訊網站，搜房網現在更像一個交易撮合者。

sentences.english: In ancient times, matchmakers held sway over who should marry whom.
sentences.chinese: 古代的時候，中國人的婚姻是由媒人撮合的。

sentences.english: Often a friend will plan a meeting between two unmarried people who do not know each other.
sentences.chinese: 通常一位朋友會爲兩位互不相識的未婚者撮合會面。

sentences.english: Wu Ma to pinch alloy wave and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 吳媽繼續撮合金波和甜甜。

sentences.english: Love Line has matched thousands of couples.
sentences.chinese: “愛情熱線”撮合了許多對佳偶。

sentences.english: It was he who had made the marriage between his friend Frank and the widow Amory.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友弗朗克和艾默裏寡婦的結婚，還是他撮合的。

sentences.english: He is mixed completely to match A Yang Chun's woman, saying Qiu Qiu is his daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他爲了撮合阿滿和楊春娘，說秋秋是自己的女兒。

sentences.english: The fathers decide on a plot to bring Matt and Luisa together.
sentences.chinese: 父親們決定用計謀撮合馬特和路易莎。

sentences.english: At last, test the sytem with performance and function testing.
sentences.chinese: 最後對撮合系統進行了性能和功能的測試。

sentences.english: Mother in heart like beauty, want to set the accomplishment and the accomplishment, nine.
sentences.chinese: 奉母內心喜歡美淑，想要撮合美淑和英九。

sentences.english: I think Sally and Macaulay would make a perfect couple. Let's fix them up.
sentences.chinese: 我想莎莉和麥考利非常相配，我們來撮合他們吧。
